trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Glenolden
There were no other sightings in Glenolden on or around June 19th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting my Mom at her house in Glenolden on June 19,2013.It was a crystal clear day and we were sitting outside when I looked up and noticed what looked like a star but moving very slowly.At first,I thought it was probably a bundle of Mylar balloons.I always have my camera with me as there are deer and foxes in the area,so I ran in and got my camera went back out and started snapping away and couldn't believe what I saw.I took 5 photos and 1 short video clip using my Nikon Coolpix P500.I'm disappointed that I couldn't get a better video but it's very hard to keep object in view while zooming without a tripod.I don't really think this is anything alien,probably a satellite but I would really appreciate any info you could provide.The interesting thing you will notice is different profiles of object which suggests that it is turning.I don't know if a satellite would do that.I saw nothing above such as a large balloon,or any kind of propulsion. Would I be able to take photos of a craft in orbit in broad daylight using 36X zoom ? Thanks for your time, Rick Forte
Summary: Bright star-like object very high in clear sky,took 5 photos of object that appears to be a satelite,I think !
